name: Demo Data
shortDescription: Stream F1 Telemetry data into a topic from a recorded game session
longDescription:
Stream F1 Telemetry data into a topic from a recorded game session.
You'll have access to the speed, acceleration, break usage and other detailed data from a real F1 car, rebroadcast in real time.

Variables.Name: Topic
Variables.Description: Name of the output topic to write into
